div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Composition.url` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.
Element `Composition.version` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.

Note that the target element context `Composition.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `Composition.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Composition.status` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Element `Composition.useContext` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.
Element `Composition.name` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.
Element `Composition.note` has a context of Composition based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Composition`.
Element `Composition.attester.mode` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Composition.attester.mode` as `SourceIsBroaderThanTarget`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Composition to FHIR R4 Composition
